trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 表示用来处理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.CellPaint" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventHandler> delegate, you identify a method to handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当你创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventHandler>委托时，标识要处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventHandler> delegate to customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutCellPaintEventHandler>委托以自定义的外观<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> control.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>控件。
